title: Falling down the "junk insurance" rabbit hole
description: If you Google "Obamacare signup," good luck finding healthcare.gov. It'll be buried under several ads trying to lure you to something less healthy. Today's show looks at a classic bait and switch.
copyright: Copyright 2015-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
